instructions.text: Walk clockwise along the circular path.
Pass Tiger Street Lab on your right.
Continue walking until you reach Lobby H near Peach Garden.
From Lobby H, keep walking clockwise and pass by Koi Th√© and LeNu.
You will then see Jewel Manulife Sky Nets on your left.
Continue towards Lobby E, passing TAG Heuer and TUDOR.
Keep walking past Adidas and AGATHA until you reach Lobby F.
From Lobby F, continue walking clockwise, passing Polo Ralph Lauren.
Finally, you will reach Oakley, which is near Lobby F.
